document.full_text: a federal district judge rejected a request to immediately order exxon mobil to pay more than $100 million to help prince william sound recover from the oil spill caused by the exxon valdez.
document.title: northwest: alaska: ruling in spill favors exxon
lines_and_colors: a federal district judge rejected a request to immediately order exxon mobil to pay more than $100 million to help prince william sound recover from the oil spill caused by the exxon valdez.
